Articles.Content: Hey, I've been looking everywhere but I can't seem to find any images of the in development (pre 0.17) MK 1-2 pod, and am wondering if anyone has a link/images? That would be greatly appreciated, as I am interested in seeing the internal structure. Thanks, and hope I posted this in the right place!
Pre 0.17 Mk 1-2 command pod does not have iva yet,but it has internals. IVA wasn't added until 0.17 and you only join at July 2013 so you brought the game at 0.21 or 0.20.
... I'll try to give a relevant answer and say "I don't there are any."
Here's the earliest picture I can find from the C7 blog.

I've actually been playing since ~0.13. Also, I found someone posted the shots I was looking for on another thread, I am just wondering where they came from,

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/14906-Intra-Vehicular-Activities/page2

you only join at July 2013 so you brought the game at 0.21 or 0.20

Forum join date =/= KSP purchase date; I bought the game in May of 2012, then joined the forums in December.

Stupid April...ruined us all

LOL, we should call the April pruge the "7 days of terror"
